cause.description:
Mayuran sivasubramaniam
I am taking part in the 2007 BUPA Great North Run in aid of CHILDREN with LEUKAEMIA.
Hello
lets join hands with children with leukaemia to help the unfortunate childeren who are suffering from LEUKAEMIA. Lets help those, who deserves better life and Thank god for giving us this opportunity to help.
Please donate by clicking this link and not the facebook link. Thank you for your kind help!
https://www.bmycharity.com/V2/mayuran
LETS DO IT Please donate by clicking this link,. Please donate over here. https://www.bmycharity.com/V2/mayuran
1. LETS HELP THIS PRECIOUS LIFES
